summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting a letter (likely a legal filing or court correspondence) related to a pseudonym order in the Epstein case. The email is brief and procedural.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting a letter regarding a pseudonym order.

events.title: Drafting of Pseudonym Order Letter
events.description: A letter regarding a pseudonym order (likely to protect a victim's or witness's identity) was drafted, as indicated by the attached document filename.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 1, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
The email transmits an attachment titled '2021-11-30_GM_pseudonym_order letter v2.docx', indicating legal action to protect an individual's identity.
The correspondence originates from the Southern District of New York, the office prosecuting the Epstein case.
